description: This gratin is cheesy, creamy with a dash of spice.
name: Sweet Potato Gratin Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g sweet potato, peeled and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180 Â°C. Peel and slice the sweet potato as thinly as possible.
Set aside 60g of cheddar cheese for later, add the rest of the ingredients in a bowl and combine fully.
Now add the sliced potato to the bowl and mix around well. Transfer the potatoes to a casserole dish in layers.
Bake the dish in the oven for 50 minutes before serving covered with baking parchment and foil.
Remove the parchment and foil, cover with the remaining cheddar cheese and bake for an additional 10 minutes until cheese is melted.
